entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
